name: Goblin Mode (onszik, Childisnothere, Cringe Master 64)
description:
Submission for Game Jam Plus 2022/2023 by The Side

Goblin Mode is a 2 player assymetric game where one player controls a goblin playing a platformer while the other solves puzzles to stop the first.

Player 1 uses the A and D keys to move and SPACE to jump on the left screen while
Player 2 uses the mouse to solve the puzzles

For this game jam we chose the themes Easy to play, hard to be good and Try together
